bonzai.api

Class Blocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • bonzai.api.Actor
      • bonzai.api.Blocker

  • public class Blocker
extends Actor
    A Blocker is an Actor which can prevent movement onto its location using its block method. By using unBlock, the Blocker can start moving freely around the map. After using block or unBlock, the Blocker will have to wait 3 turns before it can use block or unBlock again. When a Blocker blocks, it stuns all Actors on its location including Actors on the same team as the Blocker.

    Blockers take priority over all other Actor's actions when using block or unBlock. Look at the block method for more details.

    • Method Detail

      • block

        public boolean block()
        Attempt to set the blocker's position to blocking. If two Blockers block on the same location and also on the same turn, they both start blocking. Note, a blocker cannot block on an already blocking Blocker.
        Returns:
        True if you can block, false if you cannot block. You cannot unblock if you are on cooldown.

      • unBlock

        public boolean unBlock()
        Attempt to set the Blocker's position to unblocking.
        Returns:
        True if you can unblock, false if you cannot unblock. You cannot unblock if you are on cooldown.

      • isBlocking

        public boolean isBlocking()
        Determine if this blocker is blocking.
        Returns:
        True if this Blocker is blocking.

      • setBlocking

        public void setBlocking(boolean isBlocking)
        Attempt to set the Blocker's position to the given value.
        Parameters:
        isBlocking - : true to try blocking, false to try unblocking
